Posts.Title: Wig shampoo!

Posts.Content: Hi thanks Purple Fox Will definitely speak to Onc before next session and see if he can give me anything it's so hard as its all the unknown and everyone is different but it does have symptoms of a migraine Janet
Posts.Title: FEC and headaches - fuzzy eyes

Posts.Content: Hi All, I haven't posted on here before but have been a lurker since diagnosed in March and found the posts, questions, answers and advice very helpful. . I had an lumpectomy back in April with SNB which showed node involvement so had a auxiliary clearance in May started First FEC in June which kept me on the sofa with sicky feeling and exhaustion for around 5 days. The thing is I had my second FEC last Friday the sickness was better due to different tablets but the headaches have been unbearable, on top of my head and across my forehead, eyes like the light is to bright. Also been having trouble focusing, reading or looking at TV for too long :( Does seem a bit better today but is a week now anyone else had this ? Been taking paracetamol and wearing my shades to reduce light but getting fed up now. Any advice? Thanks Janet
Posts.Title: FEC and headaches - fuzzy eyes

Posts.Content: Hi Dorothee, G n J Thankyou for your replies, there doesn't seem to be many people on exemestane, that does make sense about the dose though Dorothee and thanks for the link GnJ I can have a read. Let's hope the side effects are not to bad watch this space!! Thanks all JC
Posts.Title: Exemestane

Posts.Content: Hi is anyone on Exemestane ? I was on Anatrazole but got so tired and felt about 90! Im only 50! Anyway my oncologist has put me on Exemestane instead and I'm hoping the side effects won't be as bad but am worried as the Anatrazole was only 1mg a day and this is 25 mg.anyone else had this? I'm still having Herceptin 3 weekly, I had a lumpectomy, chemo and radioterapy and my C was grade 3 invasive Thanks

Posts.Title: Possible fat necrosis ?

Posts.Content: Hi all, I had my scan and am pleased to say the lumpis severe scar tissue from the op and radiation therapy, however he did find a lymph node which surprised me & him as they all should of been taken out. Do you think they will take it out? I had 1 out of 14 infected I'm worried if they don't how will they know if it's infected or not ??Â
Posts.Title: Possible fat necrosis ?

Posts.Content: Morning all Happy New Year. I have had a larg hard lump appear which is tender/ painful a lot of the time, my breast also seems to feel very full maybe even swollon in the evenings I can't wait to get my bra off to let it breath! My bra is well fitted in the morning but feels to small in the evenings! I am 18 months since diagnoses have had lumpectomy, chemo. Rads and Herceptin. Anyway I saw my sergeon 20th Dec who said he it's feels like fat necrosis from the radiotherapy but would send me for a scan. Having the scan on Wednesday very worried as you never know Has anyone else had this please? Thankyou JC
Posts.Title: Possible fat necrosis ?
